sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>These small (less than three centimeters across) beacons are commonly placed on their target via darts or other surreptitious means, where they use adhesion or magnetism to stay affixed. Once in place, they relay information such as location, direction, and rate of movement to their user, making them invaluable for tracking an unwitting foe. The most expensive models, such as the Rhinsome Tracking Corp SureSnoop, can relay information through obstructions over dozens of kilometers, while the cheaper Astroserver Industries Rover and Trailmaster and the MechBlaze Observer tend to have much shorter broadcast ranges and can be blocked by large buildings or thick masses of rock or metal.   Models Include: Rhinsome Tracking Corp SureSnoop, Astroserver Industries Rover and Trailmaster, MechBlaze Observer.</description> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Surveilance Tagger</name> <number>GEAR0001056</number> <price>175</price> <range/> <rarity>4</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 19:11:59</sys_created_on> <sys_id>039fdb602f14a450e0f497eef699b61e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 19:11:59</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
